title: What is the significance of sincerity in modern times according to the "Gruppo di Ur"?
first_phrase: In the final 200 tokens of this text, the author emphasizes the importance of being honest with oneself in pursuing an initiatic-magical path. To achieve this path, one must focus on internal knowledge and concentration rather than external factors. The author warns against false substitutes and reminds the reader that the path is as narrow as the edge of a sword. The text includes an index of names and texts referenced throughout the three volumes. The author concludes by urging readers to use these insights wisely.
content: Avendo noi dunque sgombrato sufficiente- mente il terreno e contribuito — Io speriamo — ad una necessaria opera di chiarificé...:ione, resta ad ognuno, che abbia ben misurato sé stesso, far un uso adeguato di quanto si è esposto fin qui. E che un tale uso gli sia faqsto, tale è l'augurio di noidel « Gruppo di Ur ». INDICE DEI NOMI E DEI TESTI (dei tre volumi) Abano (Pietro d') L 127, 132, 214 241, 268; II, 132 Abdul Hadi III, 171 Adler III, 395 Agostino (Sant') III, 279, 290 Agrippa L 29, 31 128, 135, 165, 241, 268 280; Il, 159, 224-227, 293.
last_phrase: In conclusion, having cleared the ground and achieved a necessary work of clarification, it is up to each individual who has measured himself well to make appropriate use of what has been presented so far. We hope that such use is made by all, as desired by the "Ur Group". You can further explore the names and texts mentioned in the three volumes through the index.
